bug.author: darwinharianto
bug.summary: Cannot find .labelmerc file on MacOS Mojave installation
bug.description: I have installed labelme using brew install pyqt pip install labelme on python 3.6 After I run labelme, it gives me error on file not found. On the docs, I can find that labelme should automatically create labelmerc on home directory. Unfortunately, I can't find that file. How do I make labelme config files?

comments.comment: same porblem under Ubuntu. any help?
Thanks for the report. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/pull/555>#555</denchmark-link> will fix this problem
